hero.title: FuturAI
hero.subtitle: Empower students to thrive in the AI-driven future
hero.description: Using AI to understand the world, express ideas, solve problems, and create meaningful projects

value.title: Core Value Proposition
value.description: Empower students to thrive in the AI-driven future by using AI to understand the world, express ideas, solve problems, and create meaningful projects.

projects.title: Three Project Modules
projects.subtitle: Showcasing real AI projects kids can create, not just tools to play with

project1.title: AI Poster for the Future
project1.description: Create a future-themed poster using AI image generation to express a real-world idea.

project2.title: AI Future Video
project2.description: Produce a 15–30 second AI-generated video to tell a future-focused story or solution.

project3.title: AI Mini App / Web
project3.description: Build a simple AI-powered web app to solve a small but real global problem.

training.title: AI Training Program
training.subtitle: From fundamentals to real projects in a structured learning path.

module1.title: Foundations
module1.description: AI literacy, prompting, and responsible use.

module2.title: Creation Lab
module2.description: Image, video, and app prototyping with AI tools.

module3.title: Showcase Sprint
module3.description: Ship a project and present your story.

training.heroSubtitle: From foundations to hackathons. Driven by the Project-Based Learning (PBL) methodology.
training.hackathonDesc: The ultimate creation mode. 2-3 days of high-intensity sprinting, 0-1 building and launching your own exclusive application.
training.pblContent: Learning through creation. We use Project-Based Learning to help students solve real-world problems with AI tools, turning knowledge into impact.

courseLanding.signInToView: Sign in to view the course materials online (downloading disabled).
courseLanding.signInHint: Click the Sign In button at the top-right, then refresh this page.
courseLanding.noDownload: To protect copyright, these materials are restricted to online viewing only. Right-click, downloading, Picture-in-Picture, and playback speed controls are disabled.

signin.subtitle: Sign in to continue building.

imageGeneration.title: AI Image Generation
imageGeneration.subtitle: Create visual works with AI. Learn AI image generation skills and express your creative ideas.

imageGeneration.videoPromotionDescription: Once you've created your perfect product image, transform it into an engaging video with our AI video generator. Perfect for social media, ads, and e-commerce listings.
imageGeneration.dragDropUpload: Drag & drop images or click to upload (JPEG, PNG, WebP, max 10MB each)

videoGeneration.i2vWarning: Image-to-video generation does not support images containing people, faces, or human figures. Please upload product images, objects, landscapes, or abstract content only. Images with people will be rejected or produce poor results.
videoGeneration.clickToUpload: Click to upload or drag and drop
videoGeneration.imageFormatDesc: JPEG, PNG, or WebP (max 10MB) • No people or faces
videoGeneration.textDefaultPrompt: A professional product video showcasing a modern smartphone rotating smoothly, highlighting its sleek design and premium features, studio lighting, clean background
videoGeneration.imageDefaultPrompt: Create a dynamic video from this product image, smooth transitions, professional presentation

apply.title: Apply
apply.success: Application submitted successfully! We will contact you soon.
apply.error: Submission failed. Please try again later.

vision.title: Educational Philosophy
vision.content: We believe AI is a fundamental skill for the future, and every child should master the ability to create with AI.

mission.title: AI × Future Society Vision
mission.content: Through project-based learning, we help children understand how AI is changing the world and become future creators.

method.title: Teaching Method
method.content: Project-based + creation-oriented, allowing children to learn AI skills through completing real projects.
